description: Tetranacci numbers: a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-2) + a(n-3) + a(n-4) with a(0)=a(1)=a(2)=a(3)=1.
comments: For n>=0: a(n+2) is the number of length-n strings with letters {0,1,2,3} where the letter x is followed by at least x zeros, see Fxtbook link. [_Joerg Arndt_, Apr 08 2011]
